info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 13 at 2:50PM CDT until June 13 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL COLUMBIA AND NORTHWESTERN DANE COUNTIES... At 250 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waunakee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Eastern Madison, Sun Prairie, Waunakee, Windsor, Deforest, Lodi, Poynette, Dane, Arlington, Token Creek, Morrisonville and Marxville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
